entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
